description.text: You are skilled at running down your foes.

sections.Benefit: You do not provoke an attack of opportunity when performing an overrun combat maneuver. In addition, you receive a +2 bonus on checks made to overrrun a foe. You also receive a +2 bonus to your Combat Maneuver Defense whenever an opponent tries to overrun you. Targets of your overrun attempt may not choose to avoid you.
sections.Normal: You provoke an attack of opportunity when performing an overrun combat maneuver.
